actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that following the achievement of a balanced budget, any existing budget surplus should be applied to reducing the national debt.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) after a balanced Federal budget is achieved, any existing budget surplus should be applied annually to reduce the national debt; and (2) reducing the national debt should be a major U.S. fiscal policy objective.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that following the achievement of a balanced budget, any existing budget surplus should be applied to reducing the national debt.
